price: 4. Waa xagga Alle meel noqodkiinna, wax walbana wuu Karaa.
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
